00074       void constraints() {
00075          using namespace boost;
00076

00078          function_requires<ConvertibleConcept<traversal_category

00081             is_convertible<backward_category,prev_at_sourceS>::value ||
00082             is_convertible<backward_category,prev_at_targetS>::value ||
00083             is_convertible<backward_category,prev_in_facetS>::value;
00084          BOOST_STATIC_ASSERT( is_valid_storage_tag ); 
00085          // Error message could be improved

00088          h = prev_at_source(hds,h);
00089          h = prev_at_target(hds,h);

00091       }
00095       void const_constraints(HDS const& hds){

00097          h = prev_at_source(hds,h);
00098          h = prev_at_target(hds,h);
